data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Hiroshima are caught offside.
In the minute 1, Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima has awarded Hiroshima a corner.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya's Shinnosuke Nakatani attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Nagoya.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the right.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 16, Koichiro Fukushima has awarded Nagoya a corner.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the left.
Nagoya are pushing forward but Mateus's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Koichiro Fukushima has awarded Hiroshima a corner.
In the minute 28, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Koichiro Fukushima has awarded Hiroshima a corner.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Nagoya.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Oh Jae-suk.
Oh Jae-suk for Nagoya is back on the field again.
In the minute 36, Nagoya to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 44, Nagoya needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Nagoya.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Hiroshima are coming forward and Shunki Higashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 46, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Douglas Vieira of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the right.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Hiroshima's area.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Nagoya.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In the minute 55, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sho Sasaki for Hiroshima who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Naoki Maeda is replacing Hiroyuki Abe for the home team.
The away team replace Sho Sasaki with Yuki Nogami.
In the minute 58, Nagoya's Sho Inagaki breaks free at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 62, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
The home team have replaced Takuji Yonemoto with Joao Schmidt. This is the second substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 65, In Nagoya, Nagoya push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Nagoya.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Toshihiro Aoyama for Hiroshima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Nagoya throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Naoki Maeda scores to make it 1-0 at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 86, Ryogo Yamasaki instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 88, Hiroshima make their second substitution with Yoshifumi Kashiwa replacing Yusuke Chajima.
Tomoya Fujii is replacing Shunki Higashi for Hiroshima at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Shumpei Naruse is on a sub for Mateus for Nagoya.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
That's full-time at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. The final score is 1-0.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's fourth substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Hiroya Matsumoto replacing Toshihiro Aoyama.
Kodai Dohi is on a sub for Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima.
